channel.title: No idea where to start
channel.description:
I can't find a client to edit... like one already made... where is one I can use and how would I edit stuff like...
How to change the IP your connecting to.
How to make a client for your server.
How to change "Runescape" to "My Name Here Scape".
How to make the login button text different.
How to make the greeting different.
How to change the background of my client.
----------
THANKS XD
